S-PHP Documentation

A Lightweight PHP Framework

Simplifying Web Development with Efficiency and Security

Get Started

Lightweight and Efficient

S-PHP is designed to be minimal, fast, and easy to use, making it perfect for small to medium-scale projects without unnecessary bloat.

Built-in Security Features

Protect your application with CSRF protection, input sanitization, and error handling out of the box.

Simple Database Management

Connect, query, and manage your MySQL databases effortlessly with our intuitive database connection setup.

Custom Routing and Redirection

Define custom routes and easily handle redirections with optional flash messaging for better user experience.

Debugging Made Easy

Use the built-in `dd()` function to inspect and debug your arrays and variables during development.

Modular Structure

S-PHP follows a modular structure, allowing developers to organize their code and scale their projects efficiently.
